action.name: 30 Second Pause
action.label: Pauses for 30 seconds.
action.description: When this action is inserted into a Event, a 30s pause is performed at the point of its insertion.

action.name: One Minute Pause
action.label: Pauses for one minute.
action.description: When this action is inserted into a Event, a one minute pause is performed at the point of its insertion.
